content: Is it necessary that take_region_var_origins moves out of the region variable origins, instead of cloning the underlying data? It would be useful for some of the diagnostic code I'm working on to have infcx.region_var_origin during NLL region error reporting
Would it be sufficient to 'freeze' the reigon variable origins, and panic if we ever try to modify them afterwards? Or is it important that they become inaccessible?
